column5: Do a lot of people ice fish on Lac Seul and if so how successful are they? Do any resorts rent out houses or guide from snowmaobiles with portables?

As I understand it, it is not ice fished, much, if at all. The water levels are dropped all winter and the ice is not suitable / safe. This is a palce I ahve looked at regarding ice fishing. I spoke with someone years ago and they are the only operation I know of that does ice fishing in the area. I believe he said that they do not fish lac seul however, more on surrounding lakes.http://www.manitoufalls.com/ice_fishing.htm
Thanks Eyewall. That looks interesting. If anyone has ice fished with Manitou Falls Camp please post your experience.
Check out Mahkwa Lodge for Lac Seul ice fishing...http://www.mahkwa.net/Icefishing1.htm
You can ice fish on Lac Seul, though you do need to use caution. Fish can be found in similar areas for much of the winter, but action is not like that of the summer. NWO Fishing Bum
